aboutMe.aboutMe1: Hi, I'm a front-end developer from Stuttgart. In my previous job as a logistics manager, I often came into contact with programming. I have always been fascinated by the technology and logic behind a user interface. My goal is to develop innovative solutions that exceed customer expectations while having a positive impact on users.
aboutMe.aboutMe2: During my training at Delevolper Academy, I created several projects. This allowed me to expand my knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Angular and TypeScript. Some projects had to be carried out in a team, which I really enjoyed.
aboutMe.aboutMe3: In my free time, I like to explore design trends and experiment with new techniques. I also work with new technologies to constantly expand my knowledge.

skills.skills1: I have grown my frontend developments skills that have allowed me to create different real projects.

portfolio.portfolio1: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

projects.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
A simple jump-and-run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe find coins and salsa bottles to fight against the giant chicken.

contact.contact2: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.privacyText2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
